text:
I have started to wear the full set since June 2024 and I love what this brand offers. The whole set especially the bra and girdles incredibly comfortable and shape the body nicely. It really addresses to all my concerns.
Angie, the consultant is very professional, friendly and knowledgeable. She would be able to help and giving the best advice during consultation.

First time getting shape wear via professional consultation. Main aim is to keep my body in shape and toned. Angie from Delegance was very professional from the beginning to the end and advised me alot of how to keep the excess fats away so I can look better in clothes. No hard selling. Not exactly cheap but the quality of the items are really good and comfortable. Service is also recommended.

Today Nov 26, finally got a chance to meet Angie of D'Elegance to do a one on one service on e product.
Angie is very warm friendly person. She's ever so ready to assist me with e product n her explanation was superb. A very good consultant n hope e company wl recognize her great services.
Thank you very much Angie!

First-timer experience and I bought long girdles, vest and corset from Dâ€™Elegance. Highly recommend their products for anyone looking for a blend of comfort and classic beauty!

The girdle is incredibly comfortable and shapes my waist beautifully without feeling too tight or restrictive. The material feels luxurious, and the craftsmanship is top-notch, offering both support and style. What I love most is how the products can be combined seamlessly to enhance my posture, giving me an elegant, hourglass silhouette.

Also a shout out to Angie who was extremely professional and knowledgeable throughout the entire consultation, she was spot-on about my sizes and very patient with my questions. Thank you very much for the kindness and support!

I have been wearing these corrective bras for 6 years and they are the best!  I was taught how to wear a bra correctly and many tips were shared  during the fitting sessions.  It is comfortable, has good support and keeps the excess fats in place.
